i2c_attr_t Struct Reference
Inter-Integrated Circuit (I2C) Master

I2C IO Attributes. More...

#include <i2c.h>

Collaboration diagram for i2c_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for configuring the I2C port.

Data Fields

uint8_t pin_assign
 The GPIO configuration to use (see LPC17xx Devices)
 
uint32_t bitrate
 The I2C bitrate.
